snippet: John Calipari, coach of the No. 1 ranked Kentucky Wildcats, said he'd introduce player stipends and subsidized family travel to championship games if he was "in charge of all basketball."
abstract: John Calipari, coach of the No. 1 ranked Kentucky Wildcats, said he'd introduce player stipends and subsidized family travel to championship games if he was "in charge of all basketball."

headline.main: Look Who's Predicting Doom for the N.C.A.A.
